name: 凯斯·拉特利夫
name_full: 凯斯·拉特利夫 Keith Sutliff
introduction: Overview (2)Born	June 15, 1987 in Dothan, Alabama, USAHeight	6' 1½" (1.87 m)From Tampa, Florida, an actor and stylistic filmmaker whose work emphasizes nonlinear storytelling and a dark desaturated lighting/color tone. Graduating in 2010 with a Bachelor of Science Degree in Criminal Justice from the University of Central Florida, Sutliff moved to Los Angeles in 2012. He started his production company, KS Pictures LLC. From there he would produce, write, and direct multiple short films before making his first feature film in 2016.In early 2018 Keith began pre-production on a second feature film, another Crime/Drama/Thriller based film titled "The Refuge" in which he played the lead role of a getaway driver. The premiere was held at The Egyptian Theatre in Hollywood California June 26th, 2019. The film had a theatrical release in Los Angeles area theaters shortly after
